error_details.explanation: Input misrepresentation. The value for 'smaller_house_sqft' (5200) was used instead of 'larger_house_sqft' (7300).

context.question: N/A
context.flawed_solution:
#### 5600
Originally, the houses are 5200+5200=<<5200+5200=10400>>10400 sq. ft. in total.
The smaller house will be expanded by 16000-10400=<<16000-10400=5600>>5600 sq. ft.
